title: Big Brother USA 9 Live Feeds - 02-27-08
description:
Big Brother USA Live Feeds - 02/27/08 - xx2000xx

For youtube vids + exclusive content go to:  <a href="
http://bbcouchpotatoes.blogspot.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bbcouchpotatoes.blogspot.com/</a>

I&#039;m not going to even try to break down the day as it was probably the craziest of the season in terms of drama + strategy. I had 40+ clips and about 700 megs worth of material and I tried to cut it down the best I could. Descriptions will be crap because I can&#039;t cover it all.

Part 1 - 37 min
Reaction right after the feeds came back on - Josh went off on Allison and she&#039;s pissed - Josh is happy and wants to go after her again - Josh/Sharon start a smear campaign on Allison. Sheila and Nat now hate her.
 
Part 2 - 14 min
Allison comes out of the DR and breaks down. She said Josh threatened to kill her - Josh/Sharon get their HOH - Boys have random talk

Part 3 - 22 min
Cheila comforts Ali - Boys talk outside - Sheila & Ali get into a spat.

Part 4 - 22 min
Sex talk - A/M/R think all 3 of them can stay and take out James/Chelsia this week

Part 5 - 20 min
Josh/Sharon tell Ryan their side of the story - Ryan confronts Allison - Josh goes OFF on Ali

Part 6 - 23 min
Ryan & Ali now get in a fight - Chelsia talks to ali - Chelsia tells Ryan about the lesbian gimmick.

Part 7 - 24 min
Josh dances (funny funny stuff) - Ryan/Ali try to make up - Matt/Nat fight - Josh tells the group about the lesbian deal in front of Sheila and Sheila explains it.
